item.description:
Saturday, March 26 - 10:00AM - 12:00PM
Greater Boston Young Republicans will be heading to North Andover to help fellow YR and
Northeastern University alumnus, Jim Xenakis, in his bid for re-election as Selectman. Jim, at age 19, was the youngest ever Selectman to be elected in Massachusetts.

There will be rides from Boston scheduled to leave at 9:15AM on Saturday. Please contact Vincent Errichetti at chairmanve@aol.com.
item.name: Standout for YR Jim Xenakis
